instruction: What are template classes (Template Class) and how are they applied in UML?

instruction: How is aggregation differentiated from composition in whole-part relationships?
output: In whole-part relationships, aggregation is a weaker form that allows parts to exist independently of the whole, whereas composition is a stronger relationship where parts do not have independent existence outside of the whole.
